column6: "INTIFADA" pts. 4 & 5 (of 5) Rogue and Gambit's return to the X-Treme team is anything but a family reunion..."INTIFADA" concludes as the X-Treme X-Men look toward the future.  32 PGS.(each)/MARVEL PSR...$2.99 (each)
column8: | inker:Greg Adams | writer:Chris Claremont | penciller:Igor Kordey | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca
